item.title: IGN Fan Fest: Fall Edition 2025 Partner Lineup Announced
item.content:encoded:
Celebrity interviews, exclusive gameplay, trailers, and more, coming later this month.

IGN Fan Fest is returning this October with a special Fall Edition of the event. Fans will be able to watch celebrity interviews, exclusive gameplay, trailers, and deep dives across movies, TV, games, and more during the one-day event on October 15.

There will be more than 80 exclusive reveals in the main show beginning at 10am PT / 1pm ET / 6pm BST, with an additional 25 trailers, clips, and interviews in the countdown at 9am PT.

The event will include appearances from some of the biggest names in pop culture, including:

  • Keanu Reeves
  • Emma Stone
  • Aziz Ansari
  • Jesse Plemmons
  • Dan Trachtenberg
  • Andy and Barbara Muschietti
  • And more!

Further to that, there will be a massive line-up of big-name titles that will be coming IGN Fan Fest: Fall Edition 2025. These include:

MOVIES

  • Predator: Badlands
  • Frankenstein
  • Good Fortune
  • Now You See Me: Now You Don't
  • Bugonia
  • Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
  • Dust Bunny
  • Keeper
  • The Carpenter's Son

TV

  • The Witcher
  • Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Deathwatch
  • IT: Welcome to Derry
  • Chained Soldier
  • The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
  • Digimon Beatbreak from Toei Animation
  • The Last Frontier
  • The Mighty Nein

GAMES

  • A brand-new Dovetail Game
  • Scott Pilgrim EX
  • Where Winds Meet
  • Shark Dentist
  • The Outer Worlds 2
  • Jurassic World Evolution 3
  • WWE 2K25
  • Anno 117: Pax Romana
  • Denshattack!
  • Invincible VS
  • Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes
  • Terminator 2D: No Fate
  • Spongebob Square Pants: Titans of the Tide
  • Squirrel with a Gun
  • Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven
  • WH40K: Dark Heresy
  • Formula Legends DLC
  • Outbreak Island
  • WH40K: Rogue Trader
  • The Outlast Trials
  • Warframe
  • House Flipper Remastered Collection
  • Ember and Blade
  • Bladesong
  • A.I.L.A
  • Ambrosia Sky
  • Astrobotanica
  • Football Heroes League
  • Blind Descent
  • Bop It: The Video Game
  • CRKD
  • MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
  • Deadzone: Rogue
  • Star Trek™: Voyager® - Across the Unknown
  • Directive 8020
  • Dispatch
  • Forestrike
  • Goodnight Universe
  • Hela
  • JDM: Japanese Drift Master
  • Kaiju Cleaner Simulator
  • Kristala
  • Lunar Industries
  • Moldwasher
  • Mouse: PI for Hire
  • Nano Neighbors
  • NUTMEG!
  • Quarantine Zone
  • The Occultist
  • Rightfully, Beary Arms
  • Skopje '83
  • Sword of Justice
  • TerraTech Legion
  • Welcome to Brightville
  • The Lonesome Guild
  • Winter Survival

You can watch IGN Fan Fest: Fall Edition on the following platforms. The special countdown show begins at 9am PT / 12pm ET / 5pm BST. The main show kicks off at 10am PT / 1pm ET / 6pm BST:

  • IGN.com
  • IGN's YouTube
  • Steam
  • Facebook
  • Twitter / X
  • Twitch
  • IGN mobile apps
  • Eurogamer
  • VG247
  • GamesIndustry.biz
  • Rock Paper Shotgun

In the meantime, you can check out all the biggest announcements from IGN's February Fan Fest, including The White Lotus cast breaking down the darkest season yet, a panel with the creators of both Mythic Quest and Side Quest, a roundtable with the stars from Daredevil: Born Again talking about forging a 'new path' in the MCU, Jeff Probst talking about 50 years of Survivor, exclusive gameplay from WWE 2K25, The First Berserker: Khazan Trailer, an exclusive clip from The Apothecary Diaries, and so much more!



https://www.eurogamer.net/ign-fan-fest-fall-edition-2025-partner-lineup-announced
